title: SMC_ChangeGearingRatio (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_ChangeGearingRatio
Note: this function block has been superseded by
|SMC_ChangeAxisScalaingRotary|
and
SMC_ChangeAxisScalingLinear
.
Changes the gearing ratio and the type of the axis.
After execution, the axis must be restarted by
SMC3_ReinitDrive
,
in order to guarantee that all variables are initialized in a correct way.

rows.Name: bExecute
rows.Comment: Rising edge: Starts the execution of the function block.

rows:
Denominator of the conversion factor to convert drive increments
into technical units.  Units: [inc].

Numerator of the conversion factor to convert drive increments
into technical units.  Units: [u].
Position period, modulo value (only for modulo axes)
Whether a rotary or linear motor is used

rows.Name: bDone
rows.Comment:
TRUE: The gearing ratio / movement type / modulo period
has been changed.

rows:
TRUE: Execution of function block has not been finished
yet.
